issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Hello , 

I am trying to package a module (Android /IOS) and i get always an error while building , except when i use the lastest SDK 5.4.0 but when i need to use older sdk version the error appears again .

i think that there's a problem with building with previous sdk version's 

any help please ?
fields.summary: Package a module throwing error while building

comments.body:
It is something with your environment not being correct (works great for me and other module devs). Ensure that the path of your Android-SDK and NDK is set correct and all other dependencies (Android API-Level, SDK-Level, etc.) are set correctly.

And if it still does not work, we still need much more info, e.g. full trace-log, full environment and module-example.
